synopsis.text:
Earth's fate hangs in the balance as the nefarious Dr. Wheelo, a mad scientist reincarnated as a robot, seeks the world's most powerful body to house his genius brain. With his loyal assistant and an army of formidable androids, Dr. Wheelo captures Master Roshi and Piccolo, believing one of them to be the strongest warrior alive.

As Son Goku, Son Gohan, and Krillin embark on a daring mission to rescue their friends, they uncover Dr. Wheelo's sinister plot to control the world through advanced biotechnology. With Piccolo already under the scientist's influence, Goku and his allies must face insurmountable odds to save their loved ones and prevent global catastrophe.

As the battle rages on, Dr. Wheelo becomes fixated on Goku as the ideal vessel for his brain. Will our heroes be able to thwart the villainous Dr. Wheelo's plans and save the world, or will they fall victim to his twisted schemes? Only time will tell in this thrilling anime adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
